channel.title: Magrittr on experiments with R
channel.description: Recent content in Magrittr on experiments with R

item.title: the dot symbol
item.description: The dot . appears in different places in the R ecosystem: e.g. purrr, magrittr’s %>%. I will explore and explain what happens if you mix these usages, or nest them, how the dot symbol is special and how it is not. Basic usage %>% of magrittr You should use the dot if the parameter you pipe forward is not the first parameter of your next function or if you use pipe with data.
